keys.string: Professor Conrad seemed focused on the computer, a somewhat frustrated look on his face.
Sorry, [NAME]. I’m trying to run this neural network, but it’s taking longer than I’d like. Did you know that I use Graphics Cards to run my linear algebra calculations?
I just finished my homework for you class. I wondering if you could make sure I did it right.
Conrad’s expression softens as he turns his focus towards me, and we talk about his class for a while...
Well, that was good discussion, but I’m afraid my office hours are over, NAME. We can continue our discussion at a later time. Have a good day!
I proceeded to leave Conrad’s office, and made my way back to the dorm.
